page.title: 10LIFE IN DEPDEN - AFTER 10 AM
page.content: 11.35 Dash back to collect children 11.45 Arrive at playschool 12.00 Gather children, artwork - return Emma-Rose and Melanie. Home 12.15 12.30 Prepare lunch for Roy & myself 1.00 Start housework again 1.40 Have a cup of coffee, listen to 'Archers'(a popular radio serial) 2.00 Start housework again 3.45 Walk down the Green to meet Sallyanne & Jonathan from bus 4.00 approx. Home. Start evening meal 4.40 Jason arrives home desparate for food 6.30 Eat evening meal 7.00 Wash-up 8.00 Get Sallyanne & Roy ready for bed 8.30 Husband arrives home. Little ones go to bed. Watch telivision & sew 10.00 Jason & Jonathan go to bed 11.00 I go to bed
